Wisdom: اتَّعِظُوا بِالْعِبَرِ وَاعْتَبِرُوا بِالْغِيَرِ وَانْتَفِعُوا بِالنُّذُرِ
enWisdom: Take counsel from the examples [of others], learn lessons from the changing situations and take benefit from the Warners

Wisdom: إِنَّ ذَهَابَ الذَّاهِبِينَ لَعِبْرَةٌ لِلْقَوْمِ الْمُتَخَلِّفِينَ
enWisdom: Verily the passing away of those who depart is a lesson for the community that remains behind

Wisdom: إِذَا أَحَبَّ اللَّهُ عَبْداً وَعَظَهُ بِالْعِبَرِ
enWisdom: When Allah loves a servant, He gives him direction through examples

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً اتَّعَظَ وَازْدَجَرَ وَانْتَفَعَ بِالْعِبَرِ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the person who accepts admonition, is deterred [from sin] and benefits from the lessons [he has] learnt

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً تَفَكَّرَ فَاعْتَبَرَ وَاعْتَبَرَ فَأَبْصَرَ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the person who reflects and then takes lesson, and who takes lesson and hence perceives [the reality of things]

Wisdom: صَدِّقْ بِمَا سَلَفَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ وَاعْتَبِرْ بِمَا مَضَى مِنَ الدُّنْيَا فَإِنَّ بَعْضَهَا يُشْبِهُ بَعْضاً وَآخِرَهَا لَاحِقٌ بِأَوَّلِهَا
enWisdom: Attest to the truth that has passed and take lesson from what has elapsed of this world, because indeed its one phase resembles the other and its end catches up to its beginning

Wisdom: فَتَفَكَّرُوا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ وَتَبَصَّرُوا وَاعْتَبِرُوا وَاتَّعِظُوا وَتَزَوَّدُوا لِلْآخِرَةِ تَسْعَدُوا
enWisdom: So think, O people, and observe; take lesson and seek advice, and acquire provisions for the Hereafter, [for by this] you will attain felicity

Wisdom: كَسْبُ الْعَقْلِ الِاعْتِبَارُ وَالِاسْتِظْهَارُ وَكَسْبُ الْجَهْلِ الْغَفْلَةُ وَالِاغْتِرَارُ
enWisdom: The intellect acquires consideration and precaution whereas ignorance earns negligence and deception
In order to derive lessons, examples are given
For people who take lesson, examples are given
One who considers [and learns from the past] with his intellect, perceives
One whose intellect becomes stronger takes more lessons [from the past]
One who has intelligence takes more lessons [from the past]

Wisdom: مَنْ عَقَلَ اعْتَبَرَ بِأَمْسِهِ وَاسْتَظْهَرَ لِنَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: One who has intelligence takes lesson from his past and takes precaution for his soul

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرَفَ الْعِبْرَةَ فَكَأَنَّمَا عَاشَ فِي الْأَوَّلِينَ
enWisdom: One who recognizes the lessons [of the past], it is as if he is living among the ancients
He who has been deterred [from evil] has taken lesson [from the past]
